Trendyol operates in the Trendyol group structure with Dolap, the largest second-hand platform in the country, Trendyol Express that is a delivery network and Trendyol Tech that is an R&D center focused on digital transformation. At Trendyol, we are configuring load balancing hardwares and softwares and managing the traffic on entire website of #1 E-Commerce in Turkey. As an Associate System Engineer, I am responsible for ensuring the smooth and efficient operation of our systems. This includes troubleshooting and resolving technical issues, as well as providing support to our users. In addition, I am also responsible for maintaining and upgrading our systems, as well as implementing new features and functionality.

July 2021 - Present

NOC Engineer

eBay Turkey / Gittigidiyor

Network Operations Center (NOC) Engineers monitor large computer networks and servers for problems from a central location. They analyze problems, perform troubleshooting and incident response on the system, communicate with site technicians and track problems through to resolution. GittiGidiyor was founded in 2001, and became Turkey's leading e-commerce marketplace over the next 16 years. After becoming a part of the global e-commerce giant eBay in 2011, the company further strengthened its position as the industry's leader. With 60 million monthly visits on average and nearly 19 million registered users, GittiGidiyor is the most preferred online shopping site in Turkey today. GittiGidiyor operations are closed at Jul 22.

April 2019 - July 2021

CEO & Co-Founder

Gama Labs LLC

Gama Labs is dedicated to developing secure cryptocurrency wallet software that is accessible to everyone. Our goal is to increase cryptocurrency adoption by onboarding millions of people and keeping it simple and secure. Gama Labs is committed to helping with the wide adoption of cryptocurrency. As CEO, I am responsible for the company's overall vision and strategy. I am also responsible for building and maintaining our team of talented individuals who are passionate about making cryptocurrency accessible to everyone.
